utility.name: /ping
utility.desc: Displays bot latency.

utility.name: /hello
utility.desc: Says hello to you.

utility.name: /datetime
utility.desc: Displays the current UTC or GMT date and time.

utility.name: /help (category)
utility.desc: Displays this help message (utility, moderation, economy).

utility.name: /replies
utility.desc: Displays all custom replies set.

utility.name: /botinfo
utility.desc: Shows information about Maxis.

utility.name: /userinfo (user)
utility.desc: Shows mentioned user's info, or yours if not specified.

utility.name: /serverinfo
utility.desc: Shows the server's info on which command is run.

utility.name: /admes (query)
utility.desc: Ask anything to the bot.

utility.name: /makefile (filename) (content)
utility.desc: Creates file from text and returns it.

utility.name: /calculate (number_1) (operation_symbol) (number_2)
utility.desc: Does calculation. Supported signs -> +, -, *, /.

utility.name: /reply (text) (reply)
utility.desc: Makes the bot reply when you send a specific text.

utility.name: /noreply (text)
utility.desc: Disables a custom reply.

utility.name: /dm (user) (message)
utility.desc: DMs a message to a user.

utility.name: /rps (choice)
utility.desc: Play Rock Paper Scissors with the bot.

utility.name: /tti (text)
utility.desc: Converts given text to image.

utility.name: /setting (type) (value)
utility.desc: Changes your user settings: bankdm/passive -> true/false.

utility.name: /currconv (amount) (from_currency) (to_currency)
utility.desc: Converts one currency to another.

utility.name: /makecolor (red) (green) (blue)
utility.desc: Generates a color image for given RGB values.

utility.name: /randomcolor
utility.desc: Generates a random color.

moderation.name: /clearwarns (user)
moderation.desc: Clear all warns for a user.

moderation.name: /mute (user)
moderation.desc: Mutes the mentioned user (Disable chat and VC).

moderation.name: /unmute (user)
moderation.desc: Unmutes the mentioned user (Enable chat and VC).

moderation.name: /warn (user) (cause)
moderation.desc: Warns a user; multiple warns per server supported.

moderation.name: /getwarns (user)
moderation.desc: Gets all warns for a user.

economy.name: /balance (user)
economy.desc: Shows your current bank balance or another user's balance.

economy.name: /rob (user)
economy.desc: Rob others and get money (does not work in passive mode).

economy.name: /give (user) (amount)
economy.desc: Transfer money to others' accounts (disabled in passive mode).

economy.name: /leaderboard
economy.desc: Compare and check out the richest users of your server!

economy.name: /globalleaderboard
economy.desc: Compare and check out the richest users of our bot (Global)!

economy.name: /inventory
economy.desc: Displays a list of all items in your inventory.

economy.name: /shop (item)
economy.desc: Shows a list of all items in the shop, and their details.

economy.name: /buy (item)
economy.desc: Buy an item from the shop.

economy.name: /use (item)
economy.desc: Use an item in your inventory.
